reviewText: so glad i made this purchase
As soon as this DVD came in I looked if there would be scratches or anything on it.. There wasn't it was clean :) if your a big metallica fan I recommend this to be in your collection
Good stuff anybody who is a metallica fan should have this in there dvd collection
great video made me feel like I was in the life of Metallica love it
Awesome although the hated the constant filming.
Making of the Black Album, with music videos and concert footage. Contains nudity.
In the studio or on the road ... Metallica is the complete package. This is a fascinating behind the scenes look at the life of the worlds greatest band. It's a classic that still never gets old.
I love this documentary, showing the creating of the Black album and the tour to support it. I wore out my VHS copy so I was glad to replace it with the DVD.

Love this!  Brings me back to my teen years when it first came out.  I can watch this over and over again.  Fun to watch since the band members were 25 years younger and were immature and goofed around.
Bought these years ago on VHS and now stoked to have both on one DVD.
Must have for any metallica fan
love this one too. Must have. Have people wanting to "borrow" it, no way. MINE

Unless your a die hard fan, and want to watch them clowning around for several hours, this is not for you. There are some good songs, but no concert. Buy, though the never, much better. It is a concert with all their best hits. And a movie around it. I bought both, and gave this one away. It's a year and a half of boring!! Only reason for 1 star is it has a few songs, but it's not worth watching whole thing for them!!
